summary: My second mod for Skyrim, this mod adds 10 unique and hand crafted followers to the Drunken Huntsman in Whiterun.
descriptionHtml:
CM_MyGuyz
=========================
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11669
^
Thanks for the read-me on how to fix the \"dark face\" bug when creating characters.

All characters are level 10 and can level with the player until level 80 and they are all essential and u should be able to marry them. They are all male and work perfectly with the Multiple Followers mod (http://forums.bethsoft.com/topic/1345602-wiprel-multiple-followers/). They can all be found at the Drunken Huntsman in Whiterun.

*Note: There is a copy of the Breton Thetri in the Sleeping Giants Inn, I was testing him and seem to have forgotten to delete him, in order to save time and the trouble of the Facegen bug fix process, I would suggest simply hitting \"`\" button on your keyboard, clicking on him and typing disable. This should be a simple fix and should work for everyone.

Also available, CM_MyGurlz
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12465

=========================
